_notes.yes_array: YES buy orders — sorted by price descending (best bid first)
_notes.no_array: NO buy orders — sorted by price descending (best bid first)
_notes.spread: Best YES bid (22) + Best NO bid (78) = 100 means no spread. If <100, there's a gap.
_notes.depth: Sum of quantities shows market liquidity
_notes.example: [22, 15] means 15 contracts available at 22 cents YES
